data.approach: Design a template variable system with {{variableName}} syntax in templates, add variables definition to CommandTemplate interface, implement extraction and substitution, update CommandEditor to prompt for values

summary: Added TemplateVariable interface with name, label, placeholder, defaultValue, multiline, hint, required fields
Implemented utility functions: extractVariablesFromContent, getTemplateVariables, validateVariables, substituteVariables
Added Variables Step UI in CommandEditor with form fields, validation, and error display
Updated basicTemplate to use new variable system with example variables
Created three-step flow: Template Selection → Variables (if needed) → Editor

quality.preExisting: TypeScript errors in unrelated API endpoint files (implicit any types)

suggestedTasks.title: Add template preview in Variables Step
suggestedTasks.description: Show a real-time preview of the template content with variables substituted as the user fills in the form fields
suggestedTasks.reason: Would help users see how their variable values will appear in the final command

suggestedTasks.title: Add more built-in templates with variables
suggestedTasks.description: Create additional command templates that showcase the variable system: API integration, database operations, testing commands
suggestedTasks.reason: Currently only basicTemplate uses the variable system - more examples would demonstrate its value

patterns: Use {{variableName}} syntax for template variables (double curly braces)
TemplateVariable interface defines all variable metadata
Variables Step is skipped automatically if template has no variables
gotchas: Variable extraction uses regex - must handle escaped braces if needed
validateVariables returns missing required variables array
